description: Returns the number of compliant and noncompliant rules for one or more accounts and regions in an aggregator.

parameters.name: ConfigurationAggregatorName
parameters.description: The name of the configuration aggregator.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters the results based on the ConfigRuleComplianceSummaryFilters object. AccountId (string) --- The 12-digit account ID of the source account. AwsRegion (string) --- The source region where the data is aggregated.

nested_params.name: AccountId
nested_params.description: The 12-digit account ID of the source account.

nested_params.name: AwsRegion
nested_params.description: The source region where the data is aggregated.

nested_items.name: GroupByKey
nested_items.description: Groups the result based on ACCOUNT_ID or AWS_REGION.

nested_items.name: AggregateComplianceCounts
nested_items.description: Returns a list of AggregateComplianceCounts object.

nested_items.name: GroupName
nested_items.description: The 12-digit account ID or region based on the GroupByKey value.

nested_items.name: ComplianceSummary
nested_items.description: The number of compliant and noncompliant Config rules.

nested_items.name: CompliantResourceCount
nested_items.description: The number of Config rules or Amazon Web Services resources that are compliant, up to a maximum of 25 for rules and 100 for resources.

nested_items.name: CappedCount
nested_items.description: The number of Amazon Web Services resources or Config rules responsible for the current compliance of the item.

nested_items.name: CapExceeded
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the maximum count is reached.

nested_items.name: NonCompliantResourceCount
nested_items.description: The number of Config rules or Amazon Web Services resources that are noncompliant, up to a maximum of 25 for rules and 100 for resources.

nested_items.name: CappedCount
nested_items.description: The number of Amazon Web Services resources or Config rules responsible for the current compliance of the item.

nested_items.name: CapExceeded
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the maximum count is reached.

nested_items.name: ComplianceSummaryTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time that Config created the compliance summary.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken string returned on a previous page that you use to get the next page of results in a paginated response.
